BlackStorm::

BlackStorm acted quickly and she pulled Hevn to CR's Room. Soon she 
reached a repair tank and left Hevn there. She waited near that 
reparations ended

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Hevn::
>        He shakes his head solemnly.  "A joke good 
Blackstorm, 'twas only a 
> joke.  You said you wished to speak privately, personal quarters 
seemed the 
> obvious choice.  Now, if you don't mind, I really would like to 
get your questions 
> answered before i get shot in the back again."  He sighs and 
collapses back 
> against the wall again.
